text:
Hello everyone,
I’m Daniel. A Frontend Developer with 3 years of experience, working for the first time with HubSpot in my current job.

I’m from Amsterdam :slightly_smiling_face:, Just wanted to ask a quick question, does anyone knows what kind of theme/extension this guy -> <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/5207114/lessons/673/3418> is using to highlight HubL syntax (I’m using VS code too).

Thanks in advance!

Hey, we can’t see your link, as it’s to a specific portal :slightly_smiling_face: ..

You can use this extension: <https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=WilliamSpiro.hubl>
there is currently a HTML module in the marketplace. Is there a Hubl module? or a Hubl/html ?
You could just use a custom module for that :grin:
